titles.title: Election Day Registration Act of 1995
To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to provide for election day registration for elections for Federal office, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.

bill.summary: 06/07/1995--Introduced. Election Day Registration Act of 1995 - Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to provide for election day polling place registration for Federal elections.
